sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The qmail package contains bouncesaying, condredirect, except, forward, maildir2mbox, maildirmake, maildirwatch, mailsubj, preline, qbiff, qreceipt, qmail-clean, qmail-inject, qmail-local, qmail-pop3d, qmail-popup, qmail-qstat, qmail-send, qmail-smtpd and qmail-start.

sect3.title: bouncesaying
sect3.para: bouncesaying processes, possibly bouncing, incoming messages.

sect3.title: condredirect
sect3.para: condredirect processes, possibly redirecting incoming messages.

sect3.title: except
sect3.para: except reverses the exit code of a program.

sect3.title: forward
sect3.para: forward forwards new mail to one or more addresses.

sect3.title: maildir2mbox
sect3.para: maildir2mbox moves current email from an maildir-format directory to an mbox-format file.

sect3.title: maildirmake
sect3.para: maildirmake create a maildir format directory for incoming mail.

sect3.title: maildirwatch
sect3.para: maildirwatch watches a users maildir and prints a new mail summary every 30 seconds.

sect3.title: mailsubj
sect3.para: mailsubj sends a mail message with a subject supplied on the command line. The body of the message is read from standard input.

sect3.title: preline
sect3.para: preline prepends lines to a message.

sect3.title: qbiff
sect3.para: qbiff announces new mail as soon as it arrives.

sect3.title: qreceipt
sect3.para: qreceipt responds to delivery notice requests.

sect3.title: qmail-clean
sect3.para: qmail-clean cleans up the queue directory.

sect3.title: qmail-inject
sect3.para: qmail-inject preprocesses and sends a mail message.

sect3.title: qmail-local
sect3.para: qmail-local delivers or forwards mail messages.

sect3.title: qmail-pop3d
sect3.para: qmail-pop3d accesses users' pop3 mail accounts.

sect3.title: qmail-popup
sect3.para: qmail-popup reads pop3 usernames and passwords.

sect3.title: qmail-qstat
sect3.para: qmail-qstat summarizes mail queue statistics.

sect3.title: qmail-send
sect3.para: qmail-send delivers mail from the message queue.

sect3.title: qmail-smtpd
sect3.para: qmail-smtpd receives mail via SMTP.

sect3.title: qmail-start
sect3.para: qmail-start enables mail delivery services, spawning qmail-send, qmail-lspawn, qmail-rspawn, and qmail-clean.
